Generation II.Gold: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, that can be dangerous.
Generation II.Silver: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
Generation II.Crystal: During the deserted morning hours, it comes ashore where it deftly uses its trunk to take a shower.
Generation II.Stadium 2: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, that can be dangerous. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: For its nest, Phanpy digs a vertical pit in the ground at the edge of a river. It marks the area around its nest with its trunk to let the others know that the area has been claimed.
Generation III.Sapphire: Phanpy uses its long nose to shower itself. When others gather around, they thoroughly douse each other with water. These Pok é mon can be seen drying their soaking-wet bodies at the edge of water.
Generation III.Emerald: Phanpy 's big ears serve as broad fans. When it becomes hot, it flaps the ears busily to cool down. Even the young are very strong.
Generation III.FireRed: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
Generation III.LeafGreen: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, this can be dangerous.

Generation IV.Diamond: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverbank. After playing in the mud, it won't be able to settle down unless it washes its body.
Generation IX.Violet: It is far stronger than it appears. If a Phanpy is swinging its trunk around and your arm gets hit by it, your arm bone will shatter.

Generation V.Black 2: Trade with Curtis in Nimbasa City (female player character only)
Generation V.White 2: Trade with Curtis in Nimbasa City (female player character only)
